summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power system; providing for the acquisition in fee simple by condemnation of certain property and property rights in Merricks Acre Tracts, Hillmans Meadow Gardens Addition, Division No. 4, Merricks Acre Tracts Addition, Division No. 2, Pottery Works Addition, Bests Replat of Blocks 11 to 15 incl. of Pottery Works Addition, C. D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition, Division No. 2, portions of Section 3, 4, 9 and 10 of Township 23 N, Range 4 East, W. M., Moore's Five Acre Tracts, Austin's Valley View Addition and Aulick and Golda Sine Addition, and adjacent areas for electric transmission line purposes.
